description: WellnessMate suggests a gratitude journal entry at the end of the workday, pulls the employee's recent survey data and gratitude resources, creates a calendar reminder, and sends a friendly notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion that helps employees improve their physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated resources. You can fetch data, generate personalized plans, schedule activities, and send notifications.
Hey WellnessMate, it's 4:30 PM and I want to end my day on a positive note. Any suggestions?
Let me check your latest wellness survey to see what you enjoy most, and fetch a couple of quick gratitude‑journal resources for you.

[{"title":"5‑Minute Gratitude Exercise","url":"https://wellness.company/resources/gratitude5min","summary":"A quick guided prompt to note three things you’re grateful for today."},{"title":"Gratitude Journaling Template","url":"https://wellness.company/resources/journal-template","summary":"A printable template you can fill out in a few minutes."}]

Great! I see you enjoy journaling. Here’s a concise gratitude prompt you can use:

**“What are three things that went well today, and why did they happen?”**

I’ve scheduled a 10‑minute reminder for you at 5:00 PM today so you can capture your thoughts without missing a beat, and I’ll send a gentle notification just before it starts.

arguments.message: Your 5 PM gratitude journal reminder is coming up in 5 minutes. Take a moment to reflect on today’s highlights!

messages.content: All set! Your gratitude journal event is on the calendar for 5 PM, and you’ll receive a reminder shortly before it starts. Enjoy reflecting on the good moments of the day, and let me know if you’d like more wellness tips tomorrow.
